featured.text: To repair the boat and sail back to Russia.
The power workers had to work _____ to repair the power lines since the whole city was in the dark.
It is not immediately known whether the “Kawasaki” can be repaired on the fishing island of Penghu, or when the Vladimirs will be able to set off again and continue their around-the-world voyage.
Let’s send it back to the _____ to have it inspected and repaired. (A) lecturer (B) publisher (C) researcher (D) manufacturer 4.

definition.zh_def: 修理，修復，使某物恢復到正常狀態或功能。
definition.en_def: To fix or restore something to a good or working condition.
definition.example: I need to repair my bicycle before the weekend.
